Detailed Description

A wrapper class for the SIZE structure.

This class is similar to the Windows SIZE structure, which implements a relative coordinate or position.

This class is derived from the SIZE structure. This means you can pass a CSize in a parameter that calls for a SIZE and that the data members of the SIZE structure are accessible data members of CSize.

The cx and cy members of SIZE, and CSize, are public. In addition, CSize implements methods to manipulate the SIZE structure.

Definition at line 72 of file atlmisc.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

WTL::CSize::CSize (    )  [inline]
 

Constructor.

This constructor creates an instance of a CSize object. If no parameters are specified, cx and cy members are not initialized.

int    initCY
)  [inline]
 

Constructor.

This constructor creates an instance of a CSize object. If no parameters are specified, cx and cy members are not initialized.

Parameters:
initCX  Sets the cx member for the CSize.
initCY  Sets the cy member for the CSize.

Constructor.

Parameters:
initSize  Specifies the SIZE structure or CSize object used to initialize CSize.

Definition at line 244 of file atlmisc.h.

WTL::CSize::CSize (  DWORD    dwSize )  [inline]
 

Constructor.

This constructor creates an instance of a CSize object. If no parameters are specified, cx and cy members are not initialized.

Parameters:
dwSize  Specifies the DWORD used to initialize CSize. The low-order word is the cx member and the high-order word is the cy member.
